definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: This washing machine is automatic, and the others are semiautomatic.
sentences.chinese: 这是自动清洗机，和其他人都是半自动。

sentences.english: The apparatus was used in a six position semi-automatic shotblastin machine for long time.
sentences.chinese: 该装置长期应用于六工位半自动抛丸机。

sentences.english: It consists of a semi-automatic 20mm smart-grenade launcher.
sentences.chinese: 它由一个半自动20毫米智能榴弹发射器组成。

sentences.english: A type of semiautomatic assembly of micro-sphere target system is described.
sentences.chinese: 研究设计了一种微型靶标的半自动装配系统。

sentences.english: Basic design 9mm semi-automatic gun. 12 shot clip. Long-range weapon.
sentences.chinese: 基本设计为9公厘口径半自动手枪，12发，长射程。

sentences.english: The five agents are encased in body armor and are toting semiautomatic weapons.
sentences.chinese: 五个身着防弹衣的特工手持半自动武器。

sentences.english: Offset full color printing, and semi-automatization method, low stability.
sentences.chinese: 胶版四色印刷，半自动化，稳定性难以控制。

sentences.english: Based on these approaches, we developed a semi-automatic system for ontology integration.
sentences.chinese: 以此为基础，开发了一个半自动化的本体整合系统。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a semi-automatic bolt for a window (door), belonging to the field of architectural hardware.
sentences.chinese: 一种半自动门窗插销，属于一种建筑五金材料。

sentences.english: We also complete the semi-automatic annotation for the target sites.
sentences.chinese: 并根据网页信息分布特点，完成半自动化标注工作。

sentences.english: The second is, base on new RS image, detect newly added roads automatically and semi-automatically.
sentences.chinese: 二是基于新遥感影像，自动或半自动的检测新增道路。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a tower self-closing umbrella which is a semiautomatic umbrella with a tower shape.
sentences.chinese: 宝塔自关伞是一种外形似塔的半自动伞。

sentences.english: Sequence function and SEQ input for semi-automatic use.
sentences.chinese: 序列功能和序列投入半自动使用。

sentences.english: Semiautonomous and autonomous unmanned air and ground systems.
sentences.chinese: 半自动以及全自动无人机和地面系统。
